resources.string: No app scan has been performed!
To use this app, you need to enable the device administrator mode
The app needs to have administrator permissions in order to be able to perform the operations needed to enforce security settings in your device

Android Security makes your device more secured by enforcing the usage of a complex password with a minimum length as well as a maximum timeout for locking the screen. At the same time, it makes recommendations on other settings such as disabling cameras, encryption and disabling connections to open access points. Additionally, the user is able scan the device to find potentially malicious apps.
